text: Xue Yanzhong () (born February 1954) is a People's Republic of China politician. He was born in Xiaoyi, Shanxi. He was an alternate members of the 17th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China. In April 2008 he was named deputy party chief of Shanxi. In January 2009, he became the chairman of the Shanxi People's Political Consultative Conference.薛延忠任山西省政协主席 ==References== Category:1954 births Category:People's Republic of China politicians from Shanxi Category:Communist Party of China politicians from Shanxi Category:Alternate members of the 17th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China Category:Vice-governors of Shanxi Category:Deputy Party Secretaries of Shanxi Category:CPPCC Committee Chairmen of Shanxi Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Lüliang
title: Xue Yanzhong
